tool.name: Nearby features

param.name: mode
param.label: Mode
param.option: Ordered (A must be within N nts upstream of B)
Unordered (A must be within N nts of B)

data.name: oa
data.label: GFF3 Annotations from ${gff3_data_a.name} nearby features in ${gff3_data_b.name}

data.name: ob
data.label: GFF3 Annotations from ${gff3_data_b.name} nearby features in ${gff3_data_a.name}

tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool behaves a lot like the location filter tool. Features in A that are close to features in B (any features) will be output in one file. Likewise, features in B that were found to be nearby features in A will be output in another file.
